column2: News;Phnom Penh: At 1:10 pm on September 28
column4: a badly decomposed dead body of a dead man wearing only a wristwatch was discovered in Keo Chak Village
column6: Phnom Penh. ------A man cutting grass stumbled across the cadaver and immediately summoned the cops. ------Next to the naked corpse cops found  shoes
column8: and condoms. ------Due to the state the body was found in
column9: cause of death is as yet unknown.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/712029.html
